audioText: J'ai mangé le gâteau entier parce qu'il était délicieux.
question: What did the speaker do with the cake?
options: Ate the entire cake because it was delicious
Ate half the cake because it was delicious
Shared the entire cake because it was delicious
Bought the entire cake because it was delicious
explanation: The speaker said 'J'ai mangé le gâteau entier parce qu'il était délicieux' - I ate the entire cake because it was delicious. 'Entier' means 'entire' or 'whole'.
